summary: An abstract N‑dimensional transposed convolution layer that expands spatial dimensions by applying a learnable kernel in reverse of a standard convolution, supporting configurable rank, filter count, kernel size, strides, padding, data format, dilation, activation, bias, initializers, regularizers and constraints.
business_intent: Enables neural network architectures such as decoders, generative models, and segmentation networks to upsample feature maps, reconstruct higher‑resolution data, and learn inverse mappings of convolutional encoders.
